CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please provide the number of CMU AF RM19 servers.',IF(ISPICKVAL(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.Q_7750_SR_Chassis__c,'SR-a4'),'In the 7750SR-a4 a minimun of one MDA-a is required and a maximum of 4 x MDA-a can be installed.',IF(ISPICKVAL(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.Q_7750_SR_Chassis__c,'SR-a8'),'In the 7750SR-a8 a minimun of one MDA-a is required and a maximum of 4 x MDA-a can be installed per IOM-a.','The SR-7 supports up to a total of 5 IOM,IMM and ISMs. The SR-12 supports up to 10 of these same cards. When IOMs are selected, you can choose up to 2 MDAs per IOM.')))
CustomField.label: Guidance
